titleStmt.title: The application of scripture. Or The maner how to vse the word to most edifying. By Thomas Granger preacher of the word at Botterwike in Holland, neere Boston, in Lincolnshire
titleStmt.author: Granger, Thomas, b. 1578.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sold at his shop in Yuie lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
